topic: Frameworks for critical thinking in the solar industry
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that some of my foundational assumptions may be influenced by cognitive biases or outdated information. As a next step, I will identify and list these assumptions, then systematically evaluate them using research and diverse perspectives. I will also adopt tools like critical thinking frameworks and feedback from others to continuously challenge and update my assumptions.

metadata.trigger: What assumption am I making that might be wrong?
